contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Anderson}} {{TOCright}} '''Anderson''' (or '''Andersson''') may refer to: ==People== {{main|Anderson (surname)}} * [[Anderson Cooper]], American television personality, son of Gloria Vanderbilt * [[Anderson Luís de Abreu Oliveira]], Manchester United football player * [[Clan Anderson]], a Scottish clan * [[Leroy Anderson]], American composer * [[Pamela Anderson]], Canadian model ==Places== === Canada === * [[Anderson Bay]], British Columbia * [[Anderson Bay Provincial Park]], British Columbia, Canada * [[Anderson Lake (British Columbia)]] * [[Anderson Road, New Brunswick]] * [[Anderson Settlement, New Brunswick]] * [[Anderson's Cove, Newfoundland and Labrador]] * [[Anderson River (Northwest Territories)]] * [[Anderson Lake (Nova Scotia)]] * [[Anderson, Perth County, Ontario]] * [[Anderson Lake (Vancouver Island)]] === Australia === * [[Anderson, Victoria]] * [[Anderson Inlet]], Victoria * [[Anderson Island (Tasmania)]] === New Zealand === * [[Anderson's Bay]], a suburb of Dunedin === United Kingdom === * [[Anderson, Dorset]] * [[Anderson GLASGOW]] === United States === * [[Anderson, Lauderdale County, Alabama]] * [[Anderson, Alaska]] * [[Anderson, California]], in Shasta County * [[Anderson, Mendocino County, California]] ** [[Anderson Valley AVA]], California wine region in Mendocino County * [[Anderson, Indiana]] * [[Anderson, Missouri]] * [[Anderson, South Carolina]] * [[Anderson, Texas]] * [[Anderson, Burnett County, Wisconsin]], a town * [[Anderson, Iron County, Wisconsin]], a town * [[Anderson, Rock County, Wisconsin]], an unincorporated community === Antarctica === * [[Anderson Dome]], prominent ice-covered mountain in Ellsworth Land === Space === * [[Anderson (crater)]], lunar crater named for John A. Anderson * [[Andersson (crater)]], lunar crater named for Leif E. Andersson * [[Anderson Mesa Station]], an astronomical observatory in Arizona (USA) === See also === * [[Anderson Barn (disambiguation)]] * [[Anderson County (disambiguation)]] * [[Anderson Island (disambiguation)]] * [[Anderson Peak (disambiguation)]] * [[Anderson Road (disambiguation)]] * [[Anderson Township (disambiguation)]] == Companies == * [[Anderson Electric]], early 20th century electric car * [[Anderson Greenwood]], industrial manufacturer * [[Anderson Racing Karts]], manufacturer of Superkart racing chassis * [[Anderson Water Systems]], industrial manufacturer * [[O.P. Anderson]], a brand of aquavit vodka == Transport == * [[Anderson (automobile)]], an American car * [[Andersen Air Force Base]], IATA code UAM, United States Air Force (USAF) on Guam * [[Anderson Field (Washington)]], a public airport in Washington state, United States * [[Anderson Field (Nevada)]], a former airport in Las Vegas, Nevada * [[Anderson Municipal Airport]], IATA code KAID, a public airport in Indiana, United States * [[Anderson Regional Airport]], IATA code KAND, a public airport in South Carolina, United States == Schools == * [[Anderson Arena]], a sports arena on the campus of Bowling Green State University, Ohio * [[Anderson University (Indiana)|Anderson University]], in Anderson, Indiana ** [[Anderson Ravens]], this school's athletic program * [[Anderson University (South Carolina)|Anderson University]], in Anderson, South Carolina * [[The Anderson School]], K-8 public school, New York, New York, USA * [[UCLA Anderson School of Management]], located at UCLA, Los Angeles, California, USA == Other uses == * ''[[Anderson (TV series)|Anderson]]'', a TV show starring Anderson Cooper * Anderson, popular name for an alcoholic drink in the United Kingdom, containing [[Vodka Red Bull]] * [[Anderson (mango)|Anderson]], a type of mango originating in Miami, Florida. * The [[Anderson Packers]], basketball team * [[Air raid shelter#Anderson shelter|Anderson shelter]], an Air raid shelter used in Britain during WWII * [[Anderson turn]], ship or boat maneuver * [[USS Anderson (DD-411)|USS ''Anderson'' (DD-411)]], US Navy destroyer == See also == * [[Andersson]] * [[Andersen]] * [[Anderssen]] {{disambiguation-cleanup|date=October 2012}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]] [[de:Anderson]] [[uk:Андерсон]]
